thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Dale

author: Dale
title: Dale
text: We had a major flood (80,000 claim)When we would leave the house to go anywhere after the flood we would shut off the water main in fear of another flood.So did some research,and the Flo-Logic system made lots of sense.I installed the system(which was a pretty easy install)Now we can leave the house and not be in fear of another flood.This system was money well spent. Thank You Flo-Logic
